condition.ab: Light brown papyrus with a dark discoloring in the left bottom corner. Written in black ink with a thin pen perpendicular to the fibers on Recto, parallel to the fibers on Recto. The ink is faded in some places. The original cutting lines have been preserved on all sides. There are some holes in the papyrus and one large part is broken off on the left side having resulted in the loss of two to three letters at the end of two lines.
